gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Celtics 122, Bucks 119
gameRecap.excerpt: Boston hangs on despite being outscored 36-21 in Q4, to defeat the Bucks, 122-119 and have officially clinched the Atlantic Division. Jayson Tatum led Boston with 31 points, eight rebounds, and four assists while Derrick White (23 points, five rebounds, eight assists) and Jaylen Brown (21 points, eight rebounds) totaled 44 points. Damian Lillard totaled 32 points, four rebounds, and six assists as Bobby Portis (14 of 24 points in final frame, 15 rebounds) and Khris Middleton (22 points, six rebounds, six assists) totaled 46 points with Giannis Antetokounmpo out. Boston improves to 55-14 as the Bucks move to 44-25.
